'''Lords of the Rhymes''' is a "[[Wikipedia:nerdcore|nerdcore]]" comical rap group based on the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

The group features the singers Bombadil (aka B-dil aka MC First and Fatherless) and Quickbeam (aka Q-beam). During the 2000's they produced several home-made video clips featuring props made out of cardboard.

==Songs==
* The Lords of the Rhymes
** Radio Edit (clean version)
* Black Riders
* Nine-Fingered Frodo
* Sauron's Flying V Mix
